msg.msgText: Set the PluginRemoteDebugPort configuration to a valid port to enable the JVM remote debugger of the Plug-in server. To disable the JVM remote debugger, set the configuration to zero or empty. SYNTAX: imaserver set PluginRemoteDebugPort help imaserver set "PluginRemoteDebugPort=8000" imaserver set "PluginRemoteDebugPort=0" imaserver set "PluginRemoteDebugPort="

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
